TopicTitle: How do you use fine tune control?

Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, Thaddeus_135 said:

i cant figure out

First things, first.  Welcome to the forum, Thaddeus_135!

You might be thinking of attitudinal/translational control, in which case it can be toggled on/off with CAPS LOCK.  The lower left-hand Staging control will show orange/brown at normal strength and light blue at reduced strength.

I hope that helps but, if not, go ahead and describe more about what you are trying to use.

On 5/21/2022 at 1:02 AM, Hotel26 said:

First things, first.  Welcome to the forum, Thaddeus_135!

You might be thinking of attitudinal/translational control, in which case it can be toggled on/off with CAPS LOCK.  The lower left-hand Staging control will show orange/brown at normal strength and light blue at reduced strength.

I hope that helps but, if not, go ahead and describe more about what you are trying to use.

you realize this is the console forum? playstation and xbox dont have "caps locks"  on the hand controller, I made comments already about PC people answering console problems and how this is NOT helpful ok, PC people with PC people and Console people with Console people, this forum needs a CONSOLE MODERATOR which it does not seem to have.....

Edited May 25, 2022 by TokiGlassBlower
As a console player, I think it has to do something with the R1/L1 buttons. I havent tried so far.

Hi @Thaddeus_135 which console are you using?

For Xbox : Precision Control = LB/RB + Tap LS

For PS4: Precision control = L1 or R1 + Tap L3

Full controls for Xbox:
https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/files/KSPedia-XB1.pdf

Full controls for PS4:
https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/files/KSPedia-PS4.pdf
